name: Power Potion
description: This brightly colored juice is a sweet combination of beets, carrots, apples, clementines, and ginger.
recipeIngredient: 2/3 cup (5 1/2 ounces) fresh beet juice from about 2 medium beets, including some stems
1/2 cup (4 ounces) fresh carrot juice from about 2 medium carrots
2 teaspoons (1/3 ounce) fresh ginger juice from an about 1-inch piece ginger
1/3 cup (5 1/2 ounces) fresh clementine juice from about 2 clementines, peeled
1/2 cup (4 ounces) fresh apple juice from about 1 large apple, cored and quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Stir juices together thoroughly, divide between two glasses, and serve immediately.
